text.tspan: [High priority vehicle enters 20m radius of any intersection]
[High priority vehicle passes through the intersection]
Handle emergency vehicles, normal vehicles follow standard traffic lights

g.text: Automatically change signals periodically for Intersection A
Automatically change signals periodically for Intersection B
Automatically change signals periodically for Intersection N
Subscribe to high priority vehicle positions
Change signals to allow vehicle to pass
Pause automatic signal change for affected intersection
Set red light to stop incoming cars, let cars in intersection pass
Set green light for high priority vehicle
Resume automatic signal change for affected intersection
